basics.name: Dmitry Shashkov
basics.label: DevOps/Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary: From the start as QA Automation Engineer I was focused on automating routine stuff and dealing with the infrastructure so it was natural for me to transition into DevOps field after some time.

work.name: Orion Innovation
work.summary: Developing and supporting CI/CD infrastructure and assisting with migrating applications to the cloud
highlights: Application migration from on-premises docker swarm to AWS Fargate
Creating from scratch and supporting the infrastructure of small serverless application using AWS and serverless framework
Creating and support of CI/CD infrastructure based on Jenkins and Gitlab-CI
Linux hosts administration, VMs and bare-metal
Creating Ansible playbooks for infrastructure management and application deployment
Setting up small infrastructure monitoring system with Prometheus + Grafana

work.name: MERA
work.summary: Writing and performing automated tests and dealing with corresponding infrastructure
highlights: Creating and supporting automatic functional tests in Java
Creating and supporting automatic E2E tests in JavaScript+Protractor
Experience with network protocols: LACP, VRRP, BGP, RSTP (L2-L3 of the OSI model)
Working with traffic generators and Wireshark
Adapting test strategy due to changes in application architecture (moving to microservices)
Creating and maintaining automated e2e tests infrastructure with Selenium grid and Docker
